website_summaries.verdict: A fun way to create an entire experience with one purchase. If stepping back in time is your goal, this is the train set for you.
pros: This is a comprehensive kit with buildings, people, and all the needed items to re-create the train era
cons: A lot of pieces to keep track of, and some users have trouble connecting the various train cars

customer_reviews.title: Broke within two hours
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked at the quality of this train. My son has been saving and dreaming of this train for months, and it finally was here today . We were extremely cautious and gentle with it, as we read countless reviews/ watched videos on these trains before purchasing. However, with in hours of having it, the tender broke. The connector simply snapped off, and the design was ridiculous to begin with. We also had to realign and get the wheels back on track every few minutes. My son has spent more time crying than playing with this. Heartbreaking.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I love this set. Zero problems with it derailing. I would guess that the people who have this issue did not read the directions to ensure that the track bed and actual track form a smooth connection. Then the idea that the locomotive will not connect to other cars and can only push them... This is a COAL fired engine... The ONLY car that would be behind the engine is the coal handler... Follow the instructions and connect it... Everything else just falls right into place. My only issue is, I wish all cars had metal wheels.
customer_reviews.author: MAJ(ret) Randall K. Faulkner, USA

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: Came with broken wire. Bachmann sent out replacement right away. Don't believe all the negative reviews about derailing. USER ERROR. YOU HAVE TO SLOWLY CONNECT ALL THE TRACKS! Time well spent. Mine has not derailed once. Don't expect a lot of smoke from the stack and you can't elevate the track. Engine isn't strong enough to make it up any incline.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: About time
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for $84,it was always out of stock and soon as it popped up i was able to snag one.Its a very nice set alot of extras come with it. The locomotive smokes and is extremely quiet . Build quality is really nice,alot better then the Chattanooga choo choo from tyco .the rail cars all functioned good. This would be a really nice starter set for a responsible ten year old
customer_reviews.author: cyclonus

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Magic
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had a chance to put the train up yet as we are setting up for Christmas now. Our grandson loves trains, so he will love the village I'm creating under the tree this year. Trains have always been a special part of our decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Flyangel

customer_reviews.title: Starter train set.
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set. One has to take your time putting the track together so all the rails go together properly. I ran the train for almost one hour to break in slow, with no problems. I'm just getting back into training for a hobby after being retired for almost 10 yrs. I looked at all the reviews and can't see why anyone put anything bad about it.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Brunet

customer_reviews.title: Five stars- great value with bonus plastics
customer_reviews.text: Best value for sure. My son is almost 8. He was just excited about additional plastic pieces as he was for the train. This brand is also a good one for kids starting out with the hobby. Just the right price! Quality product too!
customer_reviews.author: DOUG STAPLES

customer_reviews.title: Great train.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this train set. It is great. It does fall off easy though so be careful around it because it is hard to fix back on the tracks. You have to be eye level with the tracks and wheels to but the train back on the track...what a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Young

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea and perfect for under the Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I just grew up with the old type of track and I'm not a huge fan of the new easy to assemble track.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Great train set
customer_reviews.text: Love the train set. The engine does not have enough traction to pull all the cars it came with with out a lot of wheel slip. Also the controller did not work but in one direction. I am using a controller from another Bachmann set I already had. The cars are very well made. Good detail and craftsmanship. The plasticville buildings parts were bent in a shape not intended, those were not so great. Over all a good starter set
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bock

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Engine broke on the first day we used it. JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: RadPro

customer_reviews.title: Hobbies .. kids like toy trains
customer_reviews.text: Have good memories of hobbies as young woman and got this set as a smaller and more leave up display that I can build. Easy to assemble track, a little more difficult to align the wheels on track than larger scale models.
customer_reviews.author: An Empty-Nester

customer_reviews.title: Love the train
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES his new toy!! He can sit for an hour or so at a time just watching it!!! He has made a lot of his own mountains and.rocks and.tunnels for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: transformers are bad
customer_reviews.text: Order this for Christmas at first everything was great but now the train barely moves
customer_reviews.author: charles walcott

customer_reviews.title: Hubbies Toys
customer_reviews.text: My husband always wanted an HO train. I was happy to see the price on this and even happier when it got here. What a deal. He loves it and it fits great around a tree. I will need to buy more track....lots more.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Evans

customer_reviews.title: Remote controller failed within first few hours.
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen so cheap PCB assembly for a long time. Flux was not washed, cold soldering everywhere. My son’s Christmas gift from Santa was compromised. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set, weak smoke.
customer_reviews.text: Great locomotive and set of cars. We've had a ton of fun playing around with this set. Would be 5 stars if the smoke was more pronounced, it's extremely weak and only barely works when you run the Loco at full blast for 5 minutes straight.
customer_reviews.author: Timberline324

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Bought for Christmas present. Decided to mount track on board and expand the track too. Only have run the engine on track to make sure layout works. Be aware if you want to expand, there is not accessory power connection on control transformer.
customer_reviews.author: TKD

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on track and missing coupler
customer_reviews.text: I'm very dissatisfied with this product. The locomotive won't even hook up to rest of the train unless you put in on backwards. Then it's just pushing the train and nothing stays on the tracks. For the price.....I would definitely not recommend this product, even if it was half the cost. Can't even use it!
customer_reviews.author: terry hinchliffe

customer_reviews.title: Why advertise a 1-800 number when no one is going to answer the phone
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very disappointed in the train set. He was so looking forward to setting this up, which he did, only to have it not work - at all. And Bachmann advertises a 1-800 number but all it does is direct you to go on-line. Well then, why advertise the 1-800 number??? Just write on your paperwork to go on-line. So everything electrical has been returned, AT OUR COST, to find out what's wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a train
customer_reviews.text: Worked just fine. Not enough strait track in box. People and acesssories way to small and pink in color
customer_reviews.author: Fred Ridenour

customer_reviews.title: nice start
customer_reviews.text: Not sold on the short wheel base engine and how the coal tender attaches. Had to replace the base of the tender because the pin broke. I do like the extra buildings and scenery as well as the cars.
customer_reviews.author: Cracked Jar

customer_reviews.title: Good for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: Train is great set easy to put together only down fall is the plastic wheels dont roll as smooth as metal wheels. It can only pull 2 or 3 extra cars because the locomotive is not heavy enough to pull alot.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the scale size
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t pay attention to the scale, too small for my need. Sold it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R. Schindler

customer_reviews.title: Cho Cho Chattanooga
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson for Christmas and he just loved it. Can't wait to see it under their tree next year.
customer_reviews.author: love2ridehd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, price was better than getting it from a local hobby store. Arrived quickly and had it set up and running under the Christmas tree in 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price 👍
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids are mesmerized. And I found a hobby for my husband 😁
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Train set
customer_reviews.text: My son always wanted a train for the Christmas Tree. I ordered this one and had it sent to him. He loved it and so did his children.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mead

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.text: EVERYTHING FALLS APART,VERY CHEAP AND LOW QUALITY PERFORMANCE.CANNOT RUN ANY 5 MINUTES AND HE GOES OUT OF THE TRACK,BREAKS PARTS,,SHOULD NOT HAVE PURCHASED THIS THING.,.LOST MONEY
customer_reviews.author: TIBOR FURCHTGOTT

customer_reviews.title: mostly good quality
customer_reviews.text: Every thing about this train set was great except for the fact that the buildings were hard to put together and the people didn't come off of the plastic connector evenly and left annoying little bumps on the stand!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole  R Curcio

customer_reviews.title: Tears Of Joy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has wanted a train for years. Finally bought this one as a reward for All A's for first semester. She was so happy, she cried. Thanks! Great price, great product, great shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: too bad you can't make a smaller oval to go under ...
customer_reviews.text: needed to be a little heavier. can't rough house with it. too bad you can't make a smaller oval to go under a tabletop tree
customer_reviews.author: ddt

customer_reviews.title: Great start up set.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son who is obsessed with trains. The track was easily set up in minutes and is also easy to use. I plan on purchasing more Bachmann tracks and sets as my son gets older and learns how to maintain them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Thomas-Ball

customer_reviews.title: Fragile engine components. Steam engine broke after 5 days ...
customer_reviews.text: Fragile engine components. Steam engine broke after 5 days of use. Had to send it back to Bachman for warranty repair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are happy with their gift
customer_reviews.text: pedi 3 trenecitos para mis nietos, ellos estan felices con su regalo. I ordered three little trains for my grandchildren, they are happy with their gift.
customer_reviews.author: Krwz

customer_reviews.title: I like it-My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son received this train from "Santa". He says he loves it. My only issue would be the plastic people and such. The train and cars themselves are a good purchase. I would suggest if you want more then an oval track you purchase extra track.Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Villie Frank

customer_reviews.title: Train
customer_reviews.text: What I was looking for, came with accessories , at a great price , nice looking train, grandson will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Thaddeus Sosnowski

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built car bodies, but wheels and couplers don't measure up
customer_reviews.text: Almost 3 stars because the cars are nice and solid, the set includes a huge number of little plastic items for building a display, the tracks are easy to assemble and almost always line up correctly, and the controller is easy to hook up & use. But the couplers are thin and cars disconnect easily, and after two or three runs around the oval, the locomotive will slide diagonally and lose connection with the power source. The wheels on some of the other cars also tend to not seat completely. If the set included more straight track, that would help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it!! This his second one in six months!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice train set but don’t plan accessories that need ac power
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this set from Amazon warehouse at reduced price which was good. However, it came with a missing 9” track to form the oval shape. Amazon was excellent at resolving this. So ordered the EZ track pack to enlarge the layout. Then when received, found no way to connect power to the switch tracks included in the track pack. There is very little descriptive information about the controlling power device and nothing to indicate it has no low voltage “ac” power to make switches work. Bachmann web site for a novice is awful and no help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Narelle Bedford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice train set. Grandson's birthday present. He enjoys the way it lights and the smoke.
customer_reviews.author: mark montroy

customer_reviews.title: My husband was pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked online on Amazon to find the perfect train set for my husband for Christmas. I was so pleased when I found this set. It was shipped quickly and was on time for Christmas. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Decker

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Train
customer_reviews.text: This little train is running around my little Christmas TRee on a table in my living room. My great grandchildren have been mesmerized by it. One little three year old did not want me to stop running the train. I think she would have watched it all night or until sleep overtook her. I had to tell the kids the engineer was tired and had to go to bed. Greatest toy I ever purchased for myself and the entertainment of others, young and old alike.
customer_reviews.author: B. H. Staples

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I would expect for something over $100
customer_reviews.text: This was a splurge for us from Santa...very disappointed in the fact that the cars are so difficult to get coupled and stay coupled. I was also expecting a higher quality building and people for the amount of money I paid. I am also glad I purchased extra tracks, as the main track was not much. I did not expect a super high quality train, but do feel 1/2 of it will just get tossed because it is so chunky.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Madison

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for Christmas decorations
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for going around the Christmas tree. Ran great the whole holiday season. Read issues of disconnecting as it ran, other issues, but we had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The item came quickly, and preformed just as expected. My grandchildren were thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: RODNEY L WAGAMAN

customer_reviews.title: Trains
customer_reviews.text: Steam is a little clunky, takes a while to warm up but it is a cute affect. Trainset is a good starter set, station and bridge are neat, people and added parts are pretty much junk. Engine and cars run great.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Hornby

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely loved it. He said it was the best present ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 8 year old nephew. He absolutely loved it. He said it was the best present he has ever received.
customer_reviews.author: techsupportbydefault

customer_reviews.title: but the product is really a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was on time, but the product is really a waste of money. Missing tracks, broken Hooks and lots of light weighted small figures which can barely stand on their own. It was suppose to be my Son’s Christmas present; I had no choice but to return it. Please don’t wast your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like the train at all
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the train at all. I returned it. Train kept on derailing at the turns. It took a while to create smoke, that too was not consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Praneet Raj

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: My nephew was very please when he open this up on Christmas morning. He was over the moon and it works perfectly. You have to make sure the track is secure and tight.
customer_reviews.author: lauraATarr

customer_reviews.title: First set
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent first set for a beginner. Goes together easliy and runs in ten minutes. It has enough "other stuff' to make more than a train running around a circle. A good way to get started and see if the kids are really interested.
customer_reviews.author: RAB

customer_reviews.title: Suck it, Bachmann.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for my son for his birthday. Arrived with the engine assembled incorrectly. Couldn't link cars to the back. Tried linking to front which kind of worked but derailed without even as much as a single revolution. The wheels fall off of all of the cars but the engine. When I opened the set, nearly all of the cars had to have the wheels put back on. Then they continued falling off. I can't believe this set gets any good reviews. This is an absolute piece of crap and Bachmann should feel ashamed of themselves for selling it. Very, very disappointed and returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Not too terrible, but the locomotive bottomed out on the re-railer ...
customer_reviews.text: Not too terrible, but the locomotive bottomed out on the re-railer track section until I sanded it down. Six months later I bought some switches and track sections for a more interesting setup and the locomotive bottoms out on the crossing rails at the switch, derailing very often. So if you expect to get this starter set and add to it, you should definitely get something else. For a hundred bucks I expect a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: danr

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved his Christmas Garden with this train.
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to keep all the cars on the track, but he had great fun with the locomotive. He is 8.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Porter

customer_reviews.title: The cars keep coming apart. Put it up today ...
customer_reviews.text: The cars keep coming apart. Put it up today. The people are not very realistic. Would not purchase this. Too much trouble. The cars come off the tracks too
customer_reviews.author: Carole M

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this train set last Christmas for our 4 year old. Definitely needs adult supervision at that age, but he loves it! The detail on the engine and rolling stock is phenomenal. Setup of the track is easy. Don't believe reviews that say this falls apart -- one year later after some pretty heavy use and the set runs well. If your child loves trains and you want to jump into electric sets, I would definitely recommend this one! Beware -- electric trains are addictive for both kids and adults. :)
customer_reviews.author: boy's dad

customer_reviews.title: Speed Controller Faulty. Product no longer available.
customer_reviews.text: Generally, the train set is fine and works well with headlights and smoke. Only problem is that the train can only go one direction as the speed controller is faulty. Am not able to get replacement as the product is no longer available. Not sure what Amazon can do.
customer_reviews.author: W. Tng

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it. He has had it for over a year now without any problems
customer_reviews.author: Donald Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to my train track. My 6 year old loves it
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Good track, locomotive not robust
customer_reviews.text: The track and controller are great, snaps together easily. The locomotive broke down after about two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L. Prickett

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The reason people hate it is because you don't take the time to set it up and you are too clumsy to handle it. It works well when your don't let your little kid close to it
customer_reviews.author: J E

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Can't keep it on the track long enough to go around more than once. Tracks are junk. They bend if you look at them cross eyed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: It is what I expected but one coupler randomly decouples ...
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected but one coupler randomly decouples. I have had trains ranging in scale from N to G, including O, O27, and other HO gauge, that never had that problem. It,s not a show stopper but it is irritating, especially when I am entertaining relatives or neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: John Horton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it....Amazon saved me $70 compared to the Department Store I had first seen it at
customer_reviews.author: jarhead19700

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Hard to keep cars connected and on the tracks. Plus no train whistle. No good
customer_reviews.author: Matt T.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this train for my grandson but the cars are very hard to put on the tracks. Much too hard for a six year old. Cheap plastic wheels and since the cars are made of plastic and so light it is hard to get the cars onto the track. Once this is accomplished the train runs well but don't dare touch a car when it is moving!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool toy!! It is fun to watch it go around its loop.BUT sometimes the wheels pop off.They are easy to put them back on and usaly stay on.Still it is a fun toy!.
customer_reviews.author: H. L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it, no problems at all will be buying more track for it
customer_reviews.author: kim eisenmenger

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FEEDBACK!! :o)
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today!! I love it!! A++++!! Awesome!! Fantastic!! Amazon is like a XMAS WONDERLAND!! I will be doing all of my shopping here!! Amazon is #1!! Amazon has a Great music store!! Awesome!! best place to find what you are looking for!! Outstanding!! :o)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old grandson loves it and plays with it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Terry

customer_reviews.title: A Piece of Junk.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a piece of junk, every bit of it. This is my second Bachmann train set (don't ask) and, once again, the quality was shockingly poor. The price might seem great, but there's a reason for this. Avoid, avoid, avoid.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: train got here in good time but engine was broke
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smiley

customer_reviews.title: The train is difficult to put on track and jumps off easily. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This train is junk. The train is difficult to put on track and jumps off easily. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: gregory hodges

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: not a quality one, tracks etc, i would not buy anymore buchmans train set, no smoke, no sound like same in 20's
customer_reviews.author: Nikolai Frunza

customer_reviews.title: cheaply built
customer_reviews.text: It was not what I expected for the money. I will be returning it. Wheels pop off . It won't stay on the track and the smoke doesn't work. only the engine piece is quality the rest are cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: misty

customer_reviews.title: ... trouble with the engine not pulling around the track like it should
customer_reviews.text: I been having trouble with the engine not pulling around the track like it should
customer_reviews.author: Danny Handrick

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: Some of the hooks that connect the cars have already broken. Very disappointing for a toy that cost this much!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ward

customer_reviews.title: chatt. choo
customer_reviews.text: Train ran for 4 days then would not go backwards called backman was verry rude but heartland america sent me a free mail return. an waiting for replacement train now.grandson ask everday did my train come todayn pappa?
customer_reviews.author: misshirly

customer_reviews.title: Not worth Buying this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my niece and she was very excited by seeing this. But we started putting the tracks together the problem started. Some of the them were not in good shape and recently i heard from them that she always struggled to fix them and now she had stopped using it. Very disappointing. Rgds.. Anurag
customer_reviews.author: Anurag

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice starter train. It looks good in the package and comes with a whole bunch of little signs and people. Which are probably worth 20 bucks alone. Very good deal and a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

product_meta.title: Bachmann Trains - Chattanooga Ready To Run 155 Piece Electric Train Set - HO Scale
product_meta.description:
Chattanooga Ready To Run Electric Train Set - HO Scale. Capturing all the energy and excitement of train travel is the Chattanooga. Named for the famous Nashville, Chattanooga & St. Louis Railroad, this 155-piece set includes all the miniature people, buildings, and structures you'll need to recreate the romance of the steam era. View video to see the set in action. This ready-to-run train set includes: 0-6-0 steam locomotive and tender with operating smoke and headlight, plug-door box car, open quad hopper, single-dome tank car, offset cupola caboose, body-mounted E-Z Mate couplers, 47" x 38" oval of snap-fit E-Z Track, including 12 pieces of curved track, 1 piece of straight track, and 1 plug-in terminal rerailer, suburban station, signal bridge, 48 railroad and street signs, 36 telephone poles, 48 assorted figures, power pack and speed controller, illustrated instruction manual.

AMAZON.COM
It's the romance of the train--in a box. This electric train set has a replica of an old steam locomotive with a working headlight and an active smokestack (just drop some of the included "smoke liquid" into the funnel). Linked together, the beautifully detailed locomotive and the coal tender are 9 inches long. Also trailing along are two railcars, a Penn Salt tanker car, and a red caboose. The snap-together E-Z Track pieces form an oval-shaped track that is 47 inches long by 38 inches wide. The set also contains telephone poles, a signal bridge, a station, railroad and street signs, a power pack with forward, reverse, and speed controls, and an instructional video. --Richard Farr

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Capturing all the energy and excitement of train travel is the Chattanooga. Named for the famous Nashville, Chattanooga and St. Louis Railroad this 155-piece set includes all the miniature people, buildings, and structures you will need to recreate the romance of the steam era.

See more
feature_bullets: Complete Ready To Run 155 Piece Freight Train Set
Powered by a 0-6-0 Steam Era Locomotive and Tender with Operating Smoke and Headlight
Includes; Plug Door Box Car, Open Quad Hopper Car, Single-Dome Tank Car, Off-Set Cupola Caboose, Suburban Station, Signal Bridge, Miniature Figures, Railroad Signs, Street Signs, and Telephone Poles
47" x 38" Oval of Snap-Fit E-Z Track, Power Pack and Speed Controller
